name: Castle Rescue
description:
A multiplayer co-op action adventure!

Supports two players. Does not support one player. Or three players. No hosting needed.

Some caveats:

Please don't re-use lobby names! This will completely fuck with the server!

Mana is a little busted! Don't hold down the key if you are out of mana or you will regret it! (it will take a little longer to regen your mana)

The netcode is not good at all! People outside of the U.S. be warned!

2nd level music credit: Austin Peters
